description: These juicy, fiery kimchi burgers are bursting with flavour.
name: Kimchi Pork Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 spring onions, 1/2 finely chopped, 1/2 sliced into batons

recipeInstructions.text: Place the pork mince in a large bowl with the finely chopped spring onions and 100g of chopped kimchi. Mix to form 4 patties.

Brush the patties with oil and place in a large griddle pan on medium high heat. Cook for 6 minutes on each side until browned and cooked through. Add the kale and spring onion batons to the pan for the last 4 minutes to char.
Whisk the mayonnaise with honey, soy sauce and a tablespoon of kimchi liquid.
Spread the bottom half of the toasted buns with mayo, top with a burger patty, kale, spring onions and the remaining kimchi, place the top of the bun on and serve.
